script.name: plugin.piracy.enslavepassengers
script.description: Piracy: Enslave Passengers: Enslave/extort your pasengers

line.comment: * ---------------- ENSLAVE PASSENGERS by MISTER BEAR Ver 1.50 Dec/2010 ----------------
* NOTE: Although this is a huge script, it is invoked only once or twice per gaming session. SCRIPT BASICALLY COMPLETE
* TODO: RANK PENALTY PROPORTIONAL TO NUMBER PASSENGERS ENSLAVED?? enslaving pirates angers Pirates and impresses nations
* TODO: enslaving attracts police vessels (perhaps more so in core systems)
* TODO: chop up murder victims into meatsteak cahoonas and mention it on page 3.
* TODO: Include military personnel, prisoners, passengers, demonstrators + VIPs.
* - Might be easier to add that to your STEAL CARGO script - converts those people into proper passengers..
* ---------------- ENUMERATE PASSENGERS and SET RANK PENALTY PERCENTAGE ----------------
* GET SOME COMMONLY USED SECTOR PROPERTIES

line.var: $oSectorRace == Xenon OR $oSectorRace == Kha'ak 7 OR $oSectorRace == Pirates OR $oSectorRace == Yaki OR $oSectorRace == Unknown

line.comment: * CHECK FOR BONUS WARES (TODO: Handweapons? Pirate Sidearms?)

line.text: = create text for custom menu, left=
add custom menu heading to array
add custom menu info line to array
add custom menu info line to array

line.comment: * 3RD LINE: SIDEARMS FOR HIGHER BRIBES NOTICE

line.text: add custom menu info line to array
add custom menu info line to array
add custom menu info line to array
add custom menu info line to array
player has police licence for race
add custom menu info line to array
= create text for custom menu, left=
add custom menu item to array
= create text for custom menu, left=
add custom menu item to array
= create text for custom menu, left=
add custom menu item to array

line.comment: * OPTION: BRIBE SIZE (ADD HEADER SHOWING SIDEARMS COUNT)

line.text: = create text for custom menu, left=
add custom menu heading to array

line.comment: * OPTION: BRIBE SIZE ** LIMIT AVAILABLE VALUES BASED ON UNITS OF SIDEARMS IN CARGO BAY. 5 Units/Option
* DETERMINE BRIBE SIZE USING THE ID THAT'S RETURNED AS AN ARRAY FROM THE CUSTOM MENU FUNCTION
* USE SAME ID TO GENERATE A PERCENTAGE OF PEOPLE WHO'RE ENSLAVED. LOWER BRIBE == MORE ENSLAVING
* CALCULATE NUMBER ENSLAVED, PAY TOTAL BRIBES and ALTER RANKINGs
* IF PASSENGERS ARE PART OF A MISSION, GIVE GAME TIME TO IMPLEMENT ITS OWN NOTORIETY PENALTY

line.text: = create text for custom menu, left=
add custom menu heading to array

line.comment: * 1ST LINE : # of PASSENGERS ENSLAVED + TOTAL BRIBES

line.text: add custom menu info line to array
add custom menu info line to array
add custom menu info line to array
add custom menu info line to array
player has police licence for race
add custom menu info line to array
player loses police licence for race
= create text for custom menu, left=
add custom menu item to array
= create text for custom menu, left=
add custom menu item to array

line.comment: * LIMIT OPTIONS BASED ON AMOUNT OF DISINTEGRATOR RIFLES IN CARGO BAY. 5 Units/Option

line.text: = create text for custom menu, left=
add custom menu item to array
= create text for custom menu, left=
add custom menu item to array
add custom menu item to array

line.comment: * ADD HEADING and DISPLAY RESULTS DIALOG
* ENSLAVE / EJECT / MURDER SURVIVORS. DEFINE RANK PENALTY. LOAD ACTION DESCRIPTION
* DOUBLE RANK PENALTY IF A CORE SYSTEM

line.text: add custom menu info line to array

line.comment: * 2ND LINE : # OF SLAVES IN CARGO BAY

line.text: add custom menu info line to array
add custom menu info line to array
add custom menu info line to array
add custom menu item to array

line.comment: * FUNCTION: DISPLAYS CUSTOM MENU WITH TITLE + DESCRIPTION FROM RESOURCE
* FUNCTION: DISPLAYS CURRENT RANK AS CUSTOM MENU INFO LINE

line.text: add custom menu info line to array

line.comment: * FUNCTION: REDUCES RANKING WITH SECTOR OWNER, INCREASES RANKING WITH PIRATES
* Decrease ranking with race who own this sector
* FUNCTION: ENSURES MAGNITUDE OF NOTORIETY CHANGE IS POSITIVE AND AT LEAST 100

sval.val: Piracy: Enslave Passengers: Enslave/extort your pasengers
---------------- ENSLAVE PASSENGERS by MISTER BEAR Ver 1.50 Dec/2010 ----------------
NOTE: Although this is a huge script, it is invoked only once or twice per gaming session. SCRIPT BASICALLY COMPLETE
TODO: RANK PENALTY PROPORTIONAL TO NUMBER PASSENGERS ENSLAVED?? enslaving pirates angers Pirates and impresses nations
TODO: enslaving attracts police vessels (perhaps more so in core systems)
TODO: chop up murder victims into meatsteak cahoonas and mention it on page 3.
TODO: Include military personnel, prisoners, passengers, demonstrators + VIPs.
- Might be easier to add that to your STEAL CARGO script - converts those people into proper passengers..
---------------- ENUMERATE PASSENGERS and SET RANK PENALTY PERCENTAGE ----------------
GET SOME COMMONLY USED SECTOR PROPERTIES
CHECK FOR BONUS WARES (TODO: Handweapons? Pirate Sidearms?)
3RD LINE: SIDEARMS FOR HIGHER BRIBES NOTICE
OPTION: BRIBE SIZE (ADD HEADER SHOWING SIDEARMS COUNT)
OPTION: BRIBE SIZE ** LIMIT AVAILABLE VALUES BASED ON UNITS OF SIDEARMS IN CARGO BAY. 5 Units/Option
DETERMINE BRIBE SIZE USING THE ID THAT'S RETURNED AS AN ARRAY FROM THE CUSTOM MENU FUNCTION
USE SAME ID TO GENERATE A PERCENTAGE OF PEOPLE WHO'RE ENSLAVED. LOWER BRIBE == MORE ENSLAVING
CALCULATE NUMBER ENSLAVED, PAY TOTAL BRIBES and ALTER RANKINGs
IF PASSENGERS ARE PART OF A MISSION, GIVE GAME TIME TO IMPLEMENT ITS OWN NOTORIETY PENALTY
1ST LINE : # of PASSENGERS ENSLAVED + TOTAL BRIBES
LIMIT OPTIONS BASED ON AMOUNT OF DISINTEGRATOR RIFLES IN CARGO BAY. 5 Units/Option
ADD HEADING and DISPLAY RESULTS DIALOG
ENSLAVE / EJECT / MURDER SURVIVORS. DEFINE RANK PENALTY. LOAD ACTION DESCRIPTION
DOUBLE RANK PENALTY IF A CORE SYSTEM
2ND LINE : # OF SLAVES IN CARGO BAY
FUNCTION: DISPLAYS CUSTOM MENU WITH TITLE + DESCRIPTION FROM RESOURCE
FUNCTION: DISPLAYS CURRENT RANK AS CUSTOM MENU INFO LINE
FUNCTION: REDUCES RANKING WITH SECTOR OWNER, INCREASES RANKING WITH PIRATES
Decrease ranking with race who own this sector
FUNCTION: ENSURES MAGNITUDE OF NOTORIETY CHANGE IS POSITIVE AND AT LEAST 100
